*** Settings ***
Test Template     Do lowercase
Library           String

*** Test Cases ***
Convert To Lowercases
    ABCD    abcd
    1234    1234
    A1B2c3D4E    a1b2c3d4e
    ${EMPTY}    ${EMPTY}
    ÖÖÄÄÅÅ    ööääåå

*** Keywords ***
Do lowercase
    [Arguments]    ${arg1}    ${arg2}
    ${result} =    Convert To Lowercase    ${arg1}
    Should be Equal    ${result}    ${arg2}
